Dhairya Shah is a student pursuing a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, one of India's premier engineering institutes. During the summer, he successfully completed an internship at BNY Mellon, a global leader in investment management and services. In this role, he developed a novel web application for API testing using Java and Spring Boot, thereby enhancing his backend development skills. Additionally, he has interned in Android app development at Datalane and in Natural Language Processing R&D at Lyne.ai.
